Desc.entry: Set up to help rehabilitation of patients following stroke or cardiovascular accident (CVA) in North Sheffield. Consists of both stroke victims and carers. Holds monthly meetings with speakers, fun afternoons and general outings as funding allows. Self-funding at present with staff support from Norwood Medical Centre.
